title: mAnasa poighaiyilE
sahitya:
mAnasa poighaiyilE kaNDEn gAna mazhai pozhiyum vENu vilOnanai


anupallavi

  kAnattiDai vandE kanni ennai uvandE kAdalilE kalandE kanidavani ninaindE


caraNam    eNNam ellAm anda kanNanaiyE nADum vanNanai edirpArttu vADiyE ninrEn
karattil malar mAlai koNDu nAn vandEn uLLam negizhndEnE uNarvai izhandEnE
